TopicTitle: Which Mod had the enlarge navball and offset it?

Articles.Content:
I thought it was enhanced NavBall, but I do not see the options.

If it is Enhanced NavBall, does it install the same as other mods in the GameData or different folders?

Thanks for the Help.
it comes with toolbar there you can klick on icone
Mod question moved to the mod sub-forums.

> 
> I thought it was enhanced NavBall, but I do not see the options.
> If it is Enhanced NavBall, does it install the same as other mods in the GameData or different folders?

[Enhanced Navball, by Kitoban](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50524-0-25-Enhanced-Navball-1-3)

Not updated for 1.0.x yet though
And yes, it goes into Gamedata just like ALL other mods.
